itemDescription: Northern Irish theatre director, playwright and essayist

wikipedia_page.main: Mick Gordon (born 1970) is a Northern Irish writer, film and theatre director.

response: * Mick Gordon (director) (born 1970), Northern Irish theater director, playwright, and essayist
* Mick Gordon (composer) (born 1985), Australian composer and sound designer
